name: etherney-lisp-legal-knowledgepacks
description: Complete monorepo for Etherney-LISP Legal Knowledge Packs with comprehensive legal domain coverage

scripts.test-comprehensive: node -e "const { evalProgramFromString, createGlobalEnv } = require('./src/evaluator.js'); const fs = require('fs'); const env = createGlobalEnv(); const testCode = fs.readFileSync('tests/comprehensive-test-suite.lisp', 'utf8'); try { const result = evalProgramFromString(testCode, env); console.log('\nComprehensive Test Result:', result === true ? 'PASSED' : 'FAILED'); process.exit(result === true ? 0 : 1); } catch (error) { console.log('ERROR:', error.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.ci: npm run validate && npm run lint && npm run lambda-lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-lambda && npm run test-comprehensive
